text:
Marie Josephine Hull (née Sherwood; January 3, 1877 – March 12, 1957) was an American actress. She won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for the movie "Harvey" (1950).
Hull died on March 12, 1957, aged 80, from a cerebral hemorrhage in The Bronx.

annotations.surface_form: Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
